The video shows police violence: The expert's verdict mentions that the video depicts policemen lathi charging some men. This aspect verifies the claim that the video shows police violence.
Endorsement by Somnath Bharti: The expert's verdict states that AAP leader Somnath Bharti has endorsed the narrative accompanying the video, tweeting that the policemen "ought to be suspended." This endorsement adds credibility to the claim.
Location verification: The expert's verdict mentions that the video includes a visual marker with the registration number of the police vehicle, which begins with RJ14, confirming that the incident took place in Rajasthan. This aspect verifies the claim regarding the location of the incident.
Reverse search results: The expert's verdict states that a frame from the video was reverse-searched on Google using relevant keywords, which led to a video report by Aaj Tak titled "कैमरे में कैद हुई राजस्थान पुलिस की छात्रों पर गुंडागर्दी" (Rajasthan police's goondagiri caught on camera), which showed visuals of the same incident. This aspect verifies the authenticity of the video and its connection to the claimed incident.
